metadata.synopsis: Orin has abductee Laezel, and is impersonating Laezel. Orin-as-Laezel has also taken Yenna hostage pretending to the players that Yenna is in fact Orin-in-disguise.During that camp-night confrontation, bad skill rolls or if players encouraged Orin-as-Laezel to kill Yenna, Yenna would be killed.This PAD is played when the players approach her dead body after the encounter.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Ah, Yenna. Poor child deserved better.
